issue.title: [Website] Write a blog post about fuzzing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At some point we should probably write a blog post about the current fuzzing setup. Perhaps when we have fixed all reported crashes :-)
